hero.heading: Specialty
hero.copy: These distinctive, space-saving door types are a great way to give your place a little character.
hero.direction: What to know about specialty doors

inspiration.heading: Barn
copy: From rustic charm to sleek and modern, barn doors offer bold style and a casual way to separate spaces. They hang from an overhead track and float over the door opening—different from the full close of a hinged door—and come in one- or two-door sets.

small.alt: Jeld-Wen Painted Molded Madison Barn Door

inspiration.heading: Pocket
copy: A popular choice for parlor rooms in Victorian days, pocket doors open by sliding into a slot in the wall, where they stay tucked away. They use less space than hinged doors and come in single and double configurations.

small.alt: Jeld-Wen MODA White Pocket Hallway Door

next.heading: Next, let’s go over your style options.
next.copy: Cultivate your look with the right panel model, appearance and finishing touches.
